sentences.en: A well-known voice came over the airwaves.
sentences.cn: 电波传来了一个大家熟悉的声音。

sentences.en: More and more TV and radio stations are crowding the airwaves.
sentences.cn: 愈来愈多的电视台和广播电台使无线电波段愈来愈拥挤。

sentences.en: In the last days before the vote, both sides are saturating the airwaves.
sentences.cn: 在投票前的最后几天，双方的宣传充斥着各个广播频道。
